attention mechanism.from sentence: In this paper , we propose an attention mechanism to enforce the model to attend to the important part of a sentence , in response to a specific aspect .

aspect - tosentence attention mechanism.from sentence: We design an aspect - tosentence attention mechanism that can concentrate on the key part of a sentence given the aspect .

potential correlation.from sentence: We explore the potential correlation of aspect and sentiment polarity in aspect - level sentiment classification .

to capture.from sentence: In order to capture important information in response to a given aspect , we design an attentionbased LSTM .
